The ZX-Spectrum font (spectrum.ttf) was created by WhoAmI Design, July 1998.

See other fonts by WhoAmI Design at the following locations:

* http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/whoami/reid01.htm
* http://www.cooltext.com/Fonts-WhoAmI-Design
* http://www.abstractfonts.com/designer/251/WhoAmI+Design
* http://www.flamingtext.com/WhoAmI-Design-Fonts
* http://www.freefonts.info/author/WhoAmI+Design
* http://www.mouserfonts.com/Showcase/who001.htm
* http://www.urbanfonts.com/fonts.php?fontauthor=1191
